summary: Earth, Wind & Fire is an American band formed in 1969 in Chicago. They play many types of music, like jazz, R&B, and pop. The band has sold over 90 million records and won six Grammy Awards. They are known for their unique sound and exciting live shows. Earth, Wind & Fire is in the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame and has received many other honors for their music. People love them for changing the sound of popular music.
title: Earth, Wind & Fire
